questions.question: Which storage service can be used as a low-cost option for hosting static websites?
Which Amazon EC2 instance pricing model can provide discounts of up to 90%?
What is the AWS customer responsible for according to the AWS shared responsibility model?
Which of the following AWS Cloud services can be used to run a customer-managed relational database?
A company is looking for a scalable data warehouse solution. Which of the following AWS solutions would meet the company's needs?
Which statement best describes Elastic Load Balancing?

options.A: It translates a domain name into an IP address using DNS.
options.B: It distributes incoming application traffic across one or more Amazon EC2 instances.
options.C: It collects metrics on connected Amazon EC2 instances.
options.D: It automatically adjusts the number of Amazon EC2 instances to support incoming traffic.

questions.question: Which of the following are valid ways for a customer to interact with AWS services? (Select TWO.)
The AWS Cloud's multiple Regions are an example of:
Which of the following AWS services can be used to serve large amounts of online video content with the lowest possible latency? (Select TWO.)
Web servers running on Amazon EC2 access a legacy application running in a corporate data center. What term would describe this model?
What is the benefit of using AWS managed services, such as Amazon ElastiCache and Amazon RDS?

options.A: They require the customer to monitor and replace failing instances.
options.B: They have better performance than customer-managed services.
options.C: They simplify patching and updating underlying OSs.
options.D: They do not require the customer to optimize instance type or size selections.

questions.explanation: AWS Managed Services takes care of patching and backup activities, reducing the administrative burden on customers.

questions.question: Which service provides a virtually unlimited amount of online highly durable object storage?
Which of the following Identity and Access Management (IAM) entities is associated with an access key ID and secret access key when using AWS CLI?
questions.explanation: Access keys are long-term credentials for an IAM user or the AWS account root user.

questions.question: Which of the following security-related services does AWS offer? (Select TWO.)
questions.explanation: Penetration testing is performed by customers on their own resources.

questions.question: Which AWS managed service is used to host databases?
Which AWS service provides a simple and scalable shared file storage solution for use with Linux-based AWS and on-premises servers?
questions.explanation: Amazon EFS scales automatically and provides low latency for Linux workloads.

questions.question: Which of the following is an important architectural design principle when designing cloud applications?
questions.explanation: Provisioning for peaks is traditional; AWS emphasizes elasticity. https://d1.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/AWS_Cloud_Best_Practices.pdf

questions.question: Which AWS service should be used for long-term, low-cost storage of data backups?
questions.explanation: Amazon S3 Glacier is ideal for data archiving and long-term backup. https://aws.amazon.com/backup-restore/services/

questions.question: Which task is AWS responsible for in the shared responsibility model for security and compliance?

options.A: Granting access to individuals and services

questions.explanation: Security of the cloud is managed by AWS, while security in the cloud is the customer's responsibility.

questions.question: Where should a company go to search software listings from independent software vendors to find, test, buy and deploy software that runs on AWS?
Which of the following is a benefit of using the AWS Cloud?

options.A: Permissive security removes the administrative burden.
options.B: Ability to focus on revenue-generating activities.
options.D: Choice of specific cloud hardware vendors.

questions.question: When performing a cost analysis that supports physical isolation of a customer workload, which compute hosting model should be accounted for in the Total Cost of Ownership (TCO)?
questions.explanation: Dedicated Hosts provide control over physical servers and can leverage existing licenses.

questions.question: Which AWS service provides the ability to manage infrastructure as code?
If a customer needs to audit the change management of AWS resources, which of the following AWS services should the customer use?
What is Amazon CloudWatch?

options.A: A code repository with customizable build and team commit features.
options.B: A metrics repository with customizable notification thresholds and channels.
options.C: A security configuration repository with threat analytics.
options.D: A rule repository of a web application firewall with automated vulnerability prevention features.

questions.question: Which service allows a company with multiple AWS accounts to combine its usage to obtain volume discounts?
questions.explanation: AWS Organizations consolidates billing across multiple accounts.

questions.question: Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) offers which of the following benefits over traditional database management?

options.A: AWS manages the data stored in Amazon RDS tables.
options.B: AWS manages the maintenance of the operating system.
options.C: AWS automatically scales up instance types on demand.

options.A: Permissive security removes the administrative burden.

options.D: Choice of specific cloud hardware vendors.

options.B: Grant least privilege access to IAM users.
options.C: Create one IAM user and share with many developers and users.
options.E: Activate multi-factor authentication (MFA) for privileged users.

questions.question: Which of the following steps should be taken by a customer when conducting penetration testing on AWS?

options.A: Conduct penetration testing using Amazon Inspector, and then notify AWS support.
options.B: Request and wait for approval from the customer's internal security team, and then conduct testing.
options.C: Notify AWS support, and then conduct testing immediately.
options.D: Request and wait for approval from AWS support, and then conduct testing.

questions.question: Which of the following AWS features enables a user to launch a pre-configured Amazon EC2 instance?
How would an AWS customer easily apply common access controls to a large set of users?

options.A: Apply an IAM policy to an IAM group.
options.B: Apply an IAM policy to an IAM role.
options.C: Apply the same IAM policy to all IAM users with access to the same workload.
options.D: Apply an IAM policy to an Amazon Cognito user pool.
